txt.en: Brush fires have sprung up across North Ithilien. \n\nThurindol has asked you to search North Ithilien for brush fires and put them out before they spread further.
Talk to Anborn in Henneth Annûn
Thurindol can be found in Henneth Annûn.\n\nYou should return to Thurindol with news of your success.

'Small brush fires dot the hill-sides of North Ithilien. We have led several small charges against these flames, yet reports of more come to us at Henneth Annûn each morning.

'This time of the season, a brush fire should be a rare occurrence, and not one we should be dealing with every day. I fear the Orcs lurking in Ithilien are to blame. No doubt they wish to slow us down or strike fear into us by attempting to burn the entire hill-side bare.

'If you encounter any brush-fires, douse them immediately. I know that I can count on you, my friend.'
'[placeholder], your efforts have saved North Ithilien's wilds.\n\n'Any sign of new life is a threat to the Enemy. We must be the sentinels of hope and guard these verdant lands. You have my thanks.
'[placeholder], your efforts have saved North Ithilien's wilds.\n\n'Any sign of new life is a threat to the Enemy. We must be the sentinels of hope and guard these verdant lands. You have my thanks.'
Thurindol has asked you to put out brush fires around North Ithilien.
Douse the flames of burning brush around North Ithilien ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
